live_updates: Technical crews continue to work to restore services.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30924.summary: Some customers in the Kedleston area of Vernon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30924.title: Dec 24 - Vernon (Kedleston) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
BC Hydro continues work in areas affected by power outages.
BC Hydro is still working to restore power to affected areas. Services will begin to come online as power is restored.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30832.title: Dec 22 – Lower Mainland & Vancouver Island | All Services - Hydro Related - Outage (Resolved)
